level.text: Whenever the Mayor has reason to believe that a violation of this subtitle has occurred, he or she shall cause written notice to be served upon the alleged violator.
The notice shall include the following:
The provision of the law, regulation or rule alleged to be violated;
The facts alleged to constitute a violation; and
An order that necessary corrective action be taken within a reasonable time.

Nothing in this section shall be construed to prevent the Mayor from initiating appropriate action for the recovery of a penalty pursuant to ยง105 or from seeking enforcement of this subtitle by injunctive relief or other appropriate remedy.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3 of the District of Columbia Air Pollution Control Act of 1964, D.C. Law 5-165, ยง102, 32 DCR 562, 568 (February 1, 1985).
